info.name: Cursor - Black - Plain - KMV
info.description:
Plain Black - Cursor only.

-Global.

BASE64 (non-url) for no digital footprints.

In the Public Domain. Feel free to use as seen fit - even include it in your own themes without asking.


For same cursor with Pointers;
https://userstyles.org/styles/175086/


Contact:
https://www.reddit.com/r/KMV/
